name: topdata/topdata-connector-sw6
description: Connects TopData Software data to your Shopware system

description.de-DE: Der TopdataConnector verbindet unsere TopData Software Daten mit Ihrem Shopware Store. Der TopdataConnector wird benoetigt um anderer unserer Plugins zu verwenden.
description.en-GB: The TopdataConnector connects TopData Software data to your Shopware system. The TopdataConnector is needed to use our other Plugins for your Shopware system.
